      Subclasses of CardList in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BigTwoDeck
      The BigTwoDeck class is a subclass of the Deck class, and is used to model a deck of cards used in a Big Two card game
      class  Deck
      This class is used to represent a deck of cards in general card games.

      A subclass of Hand and models a Flush hand.

      The Hand class is a subclass of the CardList class, and is used to model a hand of cards.

      Methods in <Unnamed> that return CardList 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CardList CardGamePlayer.getCardsInHand()
      Returns the list of cards held by this player.
      CardList CardGamePlayer.play(int[] cardIdx)
      Returns the list of cards played by this player.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Hand BigTwoClient.composeHand(CardGamePlayer player, CardList cards)
      A method for returning a valid hand from the specified list of cards of the player.
      void CardGamePlayer.removeCards(CardList cards)
      Removes the list of cards from this player, if they are held by this player.
